import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { UserRound } from "lucide-react"; import { MapPin } from "lucide-react"; import { Phone } from "lucide-react"; import './Header.css'; const Header = () => { const [show, handleShow] = useState(false); const transitionNavBar = () => { if (window.scrollY > 180) { handleShow(true); } else { handleShow(false); } }; useEffect(() => { window.addEventListener("scroll", transitionNavBar); return () => window.removeEventListener("scroll", transitionNavBar); }, []); return (
